official.headline: Orderly Returns
official.anchor_line: Citizens previously missing have returned to their communities, demonstrating exemplary civic alignment.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd’s dynamic systems swiftly restore social harmony, ensuring smooth reintegration for all.

official.headline: Identity Confidence
official.anchor_line: Residents are encouraged to embrace new compliance guidelines, securing uniform opportunity for all.
official.contextual_reframing: Consistent records support equitable service access and reinforce trust in our automated governance.

official.headline: Community Strength
official.anchor_line: Reports of small inconsistencies in personal histories highlight the ongoing resilience of networked civic infrastructure.
official.contextual_reframing: Technological adaptation allows the city to anticipate and overcome minor variances, keeping society strong and stable.

underground.headline: Ghosts Return Home
underground.anchor_line: People wiped by the system are reappearing — new faces, same names, but something's off.
underground.contextual_reframing: Neighbors remember the real ones. These 'restorations' feel like state-approved replacements, hiding the truth under perfect scores.

underground.headline: BCI Rewrite Exposed
underground.anchor_line: Locals swap stories: loved ones back from nowhere, memories don't match, and the BCI says, 'all is normal.'
underground.contextual_reframing: The system patches holes by rewriting people, not fixing them. Digital obedience erases real lives — who's next on the list?

underground.headline: Council Hides Chaos
underground.anchor_line: Council runs silent as suspicion grows, refusing to explain why so many identities changed overnight.
underground.contextual_reframing: With no answers from the top, citizen sleuths urge you: document everything before your history vanishes too.
